Course Outline: Energy in the universe, the solar system and the earth. Energy in the biosphere and human history. Our use of fossil fuels, its associated problems and the possible alternatives.

The evaluation will be through mid- and end-sem exams and a term paper followed by a presentation in front of the class.

You need to have a CPI > 6.0 for taking this course as an OE.

 Before commencing on the book, we will acquire

rather than being an introduction to programming in

programming language theory.
